Package com.example.cmput301w24t33.fileUpload

Class ImageHandler

java.lang.Object
com.example.cmput301w24t33.fileUpload.ImageHandler
public class ImageHandler extends Object
A utility class for handling image operations including uploading to Firebase Storage, updating image references in Firebase Database, and removing images from Firebase.

    • uploadFile

      public static void uploadFile(android.net.Uri filepath, com.google.firebase.storage.FirebaseStorage storage, ImageHandler.UploadCallback callback)
      Uploads a file to the database
      Parameters:
      filepath - path to file on local device
      storage - database that hosts file storage
      callback - listener to upload completion

    • updateAddEventPicture

      public static void updateAddEventPicture(String eventID, String imageRef, String URL, com.google.firebase.database.FirebaseDatabase database)
      updates event picture
      Parameters:
      eventID - ID of event to update
      imageRef - remote image reference
      URL - remote image url
      database - database hosting image upload

    • removeUserPicture

      public static void removeUserPicture(String userID, String imageName, com.google.firebase.storage.FirebaseStorage storage, com.google.firebase.database.FirebaseDatabase database)
      Removes the specified user's picture from Firebase Storage and clears related fields in Firebase Database. This method asynchronously deletes the image from Firebase Storage and updates the 'userImage', 'imageRef', and 'userUpload' fields for a specified user in Firebase Database.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user whose picture is to be removed.
      imageName - The name of the image file to remove.
      storage - The FirebaseStorage instance to use for deletion.
      database - The FirebaseDatabase instance to use for updating.

    • removeEventPicture

      public static void removeEventPicture(String eventID, String imageName, com.google.firebase.storage.FirebaseStorage storage, com.google.firebase.database.FirebaseDatabase database)
      Removes the specified event's picture from Firebase Storage and clears related fields in Firebase Database. This method asynchronously deletes the image from Firebase Storage and updates the 'eventImage' and 'imageRef' fields for a specified event in Firebase Database.
      Parameters:
      eventID - The ID of the event whose picture is to be removed.
      imageName - The name of the image file to remove.
      storage - The FirebaseStorage instance to use for deletion.
      database - The FirebaseDatabase instance to use for updating.
